## percentageFilter() function

Percentage client filter function.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function percentageFilter(percent: number, random?: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  percent | number | The percent of the time to pass, a numeric value between 0 and 1. |
|  random | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Math.random() generated floating-point. |

**Returns:**

boolean

## Remarks

This will return true a certain percentage of the time.
